about_the_game:
Welcome to the MFL!
Mutant Football League 2, is an arcade style football game that is a rollercoaster ride of thrills, strategy, and unbridled action brought to you by the designer/creator of the original Sega Genesis classic Mutant League Football and Mutant League Hockey. MFL2 delivers deep strategic 8-on-8 gameplay, with bone-shattering hits and maniacal mutants that parody your favorite players.
Prepare yourself for the most outrageously brutal football you’ll ever experience. Enter diabolical arenas teeming with deadly traps that set the stage for mayhem and destruction. Victory can be achieved by achieving the highest score or obliterating your opponents, aided using special "Dirty Tricks" plays that will leave your foes reeling and bleeding. Get ready to outwit, cheat, and decimate your way to victory.
Whether you're a die-hard sports enthusiast or a casual gamer seeking exciting entertainment, MFL2 promises an experience filled with unpredictable mayhem that will leave you breathless.
Get ready to unleash your inner mutant on the field of mayhem!

MFL2 Features

Blood and Guts

Brace yourself for exploding body parts, comically horrific deaths, and blood splatters that paint the field red in a spectacle of carnage that distinguishes MFL2 from conventional sports games. Whether it's a player getting blitzed by a rampaging monster or succumbing to a trap-laden end zone, every game is a symphony of unpredictable mayhem. In the MFL, you have two paths to triumph: scoring the most points in classic football fashion or racking up a body count that leaves the opposition in tatters, causing them to forfeit.

Multiplayer Mayhem

Two-player online mayhem. The rowdiest, dirtiest, most insane online Multiplayer you’ll ever experience with across-the-board graphical and technical improvements for a deeper, more vibrant mutated world to battle in. Extensive leaderboards and popularity rankings let everyone in the league know whose ruling the day.

Over 40 Mutated MFL Teams

Choose from over 40 MFL teams made up of maniacal mutants including wisecracking Skeletal Deadheads, Armored Bruiserbots, Mutated Humans, and Monstrous Orcs among other ghoulishly fiendish species.
  • 32 pro-league teams like the Karcass City Creeps, Killadelphia Evils, and Blitzburgh Steelheads. Includes updated team rosters and player ratings for every new season.
  • 16 minor league teams like the Orcs of Hazards and Tokyo Terminators.
  • Create your own outlandish MFL team!

Player Personalization and Skins

Your players will evolve before your very eyes as they are upgraded, sporting larger armor and unlocking mind-blowing levels of customization to enhance their visual style and unleash their unique brand of badassery.
  • Different armor sets based on players XP level
  • Gross facial mutations and deformations
  • Stand out from the crowd with outrageous player skins

Dynasty Supreme

MFL’s franchise mode. It is a single-player experience where you become the coach and GM of your favorite Mutant Football League team or create your own unique team. You’ll start in the minor league and claw and fight your way into the pro league, turning a group of scrub and rookie players into legendary champions. Win multiple Mayhem Bowls over several seasons to become the league’s next dynasty.
Dynasty Supreme features include:
  • Create your own Dynasty Team
  • Multiple Seasons
  • Player Drafts
  • 2 leagues (minor and pro)
  • Player Cards (unlock player trades and free agents)
  • Hilarious and entertaining player management

MFL Player Cards

Player Cards unlock free agents and player trades, add historic hall of maim legends, and gain the power to replace weaker players with stronger ones on your team's roster, instantly boosting their overall effectiveness on the field.
  • Current MFL Player (5 grades of cards)
  • Rookie class
  • Historic Players from the greatest MFL ever
  • Historic Legends

Dirty Tricks

Each team comes equipped with its own arsenal of twisted special plays known as Dirty Tricks. Dirty Tricks are the game-changers that can turn the tide of any match.
  • Bribe a ref play and turn the tables with a questionable call that puts the odds back in your favor.
  • Throw a bomb to take out the opposing team's All-Star defensive back.
  • Rile up the home crowd into a murderous frenzy, turning the stadium into a cauldron of hostility.
  • Go all-in with Shotguns and Chainsaws, equipping your players with deadly weapons to inflict maximum carnage against the unsuspecting competition while you make a break for the end zone.
Mastering when and how to use your Dirty Tricks becomes a strategic gamble, as you outwit and outmaneuver your opponents with diabolical flair.

The Killing Fields

In the Mutant Football League, each stadium is a battlefield with its own unique set of deadly traps and hazards.
  • As you sprint towards the end zone, be wary of buzz saws that can slice through mutants like a hot knife through butter.
  • Watch your step to avoid land mines that could turn a promising play into a fiery disaster.
  • Mutant worms await the unsuspecting, ready-to-swallow players whole.
  • Fire geysers erupt unpredictably, turning the field into a hellish landscape.
These hazards aren't just obstacles; they're strategic elements that can be used to your advantage adding another layer of depth and strategy to the game.

content_descriptors.notes: Mutant Football League 2 and its addons features violence, blood and gore (including exploding body parts, comically horrific deaths, and blood splatters) and some strong language.

legal_notice:
The MUTANT FOOTBALL LEAGUE® game is a work of parody and is not affiliated with, and not endorsed or sponsored by, the National Football League or the National Football League Players Association.

© 2024 Digital Dreams Entertainment Inc.
MUTANT FOOTBALL LEAGUE, MFL, the MUTANT FOOTBALL LEAGUE logo and the MFL logo are trademarks of Digital Dreams Entertainment Inc. in the U.S. and other countries.
All rights reserved.
name: Mutant Football League 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 3.7GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 1060
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 5700X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 2060
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Mutant Football League 2 is a hard-hitting, arcade-style football game that combines intense gameplay, wisecracking mutants, weapons, deep strategy, and outrageous humor. Prepare yourself for the most insanely brutal football you’ll ever experience.
